snippet: Some current advertisers would not meet the new standards announced by the entertainment giant on Tuesday.
abstract: Walt Disney Co, in an effort to address concerns about entertainment's role in childhood obesity, says all products advertised on its child-focused television channels, radio stations and Web sites must comply with a strict new set of nutritional standards; some soft drinks, packaged meals, candy, sugared cereal and fast food will no longer be acceptable ad material.
lead_paragraph: Some current advertisers would not meet the new standards announced by the entertainment giant on Tuesday.

headline.seo: In Nutrition Initiative, Disney to Restrict Advertising
headline.main: Promoting Nutrition, Disney to Restrict Junk-Food Ads
headline.print_headline: Promoting Nutrition, Disney to Restrict Junk-Food Ads
